analysis_metadata.search_method: MCP-powered BrightData search + Neo4j entity analysis
analysis_metadata.detection_algorithm: Multi-factor RFP scoring with Yellow Panther fit analysis

detected_opportunities.rfp_title: Global Training and Education Programme LMS Provider
detected_opportunities.description: We're inviting proposals from experienced LMS providers to support International Cricket Council global Training and Education Programme. This is a great opportunity to help shape the future of cricket education through a dynamic and accessible digital platform for coaches, umpires, curators, and ICC Members worldwide.

Multiple digital transformation partnership signals detected including technology partnerships with Snapdragon and DXC Technology. Manchester United is actively seeking digital innovation partners for fan engagement and platform modernization.
recommended_actions: Direct contact with Ben Hibbs (Head of Digital Products)
Prepare sports digital transformation case studies
Highlight Team GB Olympic app experience

recommended_actions: Contact Simon Clegg CBE (former BOA CEO)
Leverage Team GB Olympic app experience

webhook_processing_workflow.signal_ingestion: Real-time webhook payloads received from LinkedIn, company feeds, news sources
webhook_processing_workflow.initial_filtering: Keyword matching against RFP patterns (request for proposal, digital transformation, seeking partners)
webhook_processing_workflow.entity_resolution: Neo4j lookup to match organization names and retrieve Yellow Panther fit scores
webhook_processing_workflow.content_analysis: Full text analysis using BrightData scraping for comprehensive context
webhook_processing_workflow.scoring_algorithm: Multi-factor scoring: keyword matching (40%) + semantic analysis (30%) + Yellow Panther fit (30%)
webhook_processing_workflow.historical_logging: All signals stored in Supabase for backtesting and analytics

missed_timing_advantages.with_webhooks: Real-time detection within minutes of posting
missed_timing_advantages.impact_on_icc_rfp: Could have engaged ICC contacts immediately instead of discovering after analysis

claude_agent_performance_analysis.role_in_rfp_discovery: Strategic intelligence analysis and opportunity validation

claude_agent_capabilities.semantic_analysis: Analyzed LinkedIn content beyond keyword matching to understand true RFP intent
claude_agent_capabilities.entity_intelligence: Leveraged Neo4j knowledge graph to identify Yellow Panther service alignment
claude_agent_capabilities.market_context: Assessed competitive landscape and positioning opportunities
claude_agent_capabilities.value_assessment: Cal realistic budget estimates based on organization type and project scope
claude_agent_capabilities.strategic_guidance: Provided actionable recommendations for each opportunity

claude_agent_workflow.entity_analysis: Queried Neo4j database to identify high-priority sports organizations
claude_agent_workflow.signal_detection: Used BrightData MCP tools to search and scrape LinkedIn content for RFP signals
claude_agent_workflow.content_intelligence: Applied advanced language models to distinguish real opportunities from general discussions
claude_agent_workflow.scoring_refinement: Enhanced basic keyword detection with semantic understanding and business context
claude_agent_workflow.opportunity_validation: Cross-referenced findings with Yellow Panther service capabilities and past success stories

claude_agent_success_factors.domain_expertise: Deep understanding of sports industry procurement patterns and digital transformation trends
claude_agent_success_factors.mcp_tool_integration: Seamless use of Neo4j and BrightData tools for comprehensive data gathering
claude_agent_success_factors.business_acumen: Ability to assess opportunity value and fit with Yellow Panther's strategic positioning
claude_agent_success_factors.context_awareness: Recognition of timing advantages and competitive positioning opportunities
claude_agent_success_factors.actionable_intelligence: Translation of raw signals into specific, executable business recommendations

claude_vs_webhook_synergy.webhooks_strength: Real-time signal detection and automated alerting
claude_vs_webhook_synergy.claude_strength: Deep analysis, context understanding, and strategic recommendation
claude_vs_webhook_synergy.combined_power: Webhooks provide speed + Claude provides intelligence = Maximum competitive advantage
claude_vs_webhook_synergy.workflow_integration: Webhooks trigger Claude analysis for high-priority signals requiring deeper assessment

integrated_system_assessment.webhook_performance_grade: A- (Would have detected all opportunities in real-time)
